## Description {#details}

An <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/xray/xrayrecord">XRayRecord</a> is the denormalized view of data associated in a trace.

These records may not correspond to actual entries in the raw traces, but they are the logical representation of records in a higher-level event log.

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/xrayrecord-h">XRayRecord.h</a>.

### RecordType {#ad0bb1ba1933665c9468589e8b1ddbf3e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::xray::XRayRecord::RecordType</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/statepointlowering-cpp/#ae5fbc6e1ce3fcbb7f185ed9e7beffec7">RecordType</a> values are used as &quot;sub-types&quot; which have meaning in the context of the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a></code> below.

For function call and custom event records, the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/statepointlowering-cpp/#ae5fbc6e1ce3fcbb7f185ed9e7beffec7">RecordType</a> is always 0, while for typed events we store the type in the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/statepointlowering-cpp/#ae5fbc6e1ce3fcbb7f185ed9e7beffec7">RecordType</a> field.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/xrayrecord-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/xrayrecord-h">XRayRecord.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
